definition: reversed (turned backward) in order or nature or effect, something inverted in sequence or character or effect
details:
adjective
- reversed (turned backward) in order or nature or effect
= synonyms: reverse
- opposite in nature or effect or relation to another quantity
= example: opposite in nature or effect or relation to another quantity
noun
- something inverted in sequence or character or effect
= example: something inverted in sequence or character or effect
= synonyms: opposite
